page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: At 7.30am I woke up.For breakfast I had cereal.I watched T.V.Then made my bed.I wear a summer uniform,it is a blue checked dress,white belt and blue cardigan.I walked to school.It took me 5 minutes.I met my friend and we talked untill the whistle went.Our teacher took the register then we went into assembly.We did geography untill play time.It was about map reading.At play time I ate a chocolate bar.I played handstands and cartwheels with my friends.When we came in from play we had to carry on with our projects. My project was about girls in Saxon times.We did that till lunch time.I went home for lunch.When I arrived back at school I talked to my friend.The whistle went and we were sent in.We got changed for sports.We went out onto the field.We had to run once round the field. {
